prompt: Which of the following is the LEAST important to consider in choosing a type of media to use to move files?
feedback: If you’re using media like a CD, flash drive, or SD card to move files, it’s important that your file will fit on the media you’re using, so you need to know both how big the files are and how much information the media holds. You’ll also want to consider whether you’d be able to erase and reuse the media... particularly for DVDs and CDs, some of them can be reused and some can’t. The least important thing to consider on this list is the types of files that you’re moving. For the most part, you can move any kind of file with any type of media.
